title: Attention People In Bronze!
body:
Tired of endlessly being at the mercy of trolls? Tired of pairing with randoms who would rather abuse you than actually working as a team?  Tired of people throwing games in ranked because that just can't be bothered playing properly because it doesn't matter for them? Looking for a team that takes League seriously? 

Join me and my friends as we try and spread some positive attitude in the tiresome elo that is bronze. If we are lucky we may even make it out of bronze. We welcome all, we are happy to teach and give feed back. My friends list vary between bronze up to plats so we always have nice people to learn off.

The more the merrier. We take all comers. We mainly use Discord but Teamspeak can be used as well.

Comment on here so I can add you and let the fun begin!

replies.body: IGN: ThreshXG. Took about 3 months off and got stuck in bronze, and as a support main its harder to climb especially when bronze mentality comes into play and "You're support ward more" or "Report supp KS, running it down mid" comes into play, please help a brother out.

i climbed from b3 to s2 (then got deranked for the reasons youre listing as well as my own bl sometimes) i honestly just climbed out of bronze with nami, lulu, sona and lux mainly nami and lux, sometimes you have to carry from the support role sadly

ign # iAmVader just got to silver 5 but still wanna get higher ..atleast S3 or S2  by the end of this season please do add .. i spamed leona in rank all the way from B4 to S5 ... now im mastry 7 with her . just looking for a good ADC :/

Hey there a ADC main normally i have Varus Mastery level 7 and i would love to team up with you i got to B4-B1 with him only
but i'm in silver 5 now which is good so feel free to add me :)  IGN ToshiroT1

This is great and all, I definitely appreciate anyone who wants to actually play this game with a positive attitude, but I'd advise you to be careful about 'taking all comers'. People who can play with players of varying skill levels and not quickly degenerate into a state of rage are pretty rare. And people have very different ideas of what a positive attitude consists of - some think that it means that everyone else does exactly what they say all the time, some think it means not caring about winning at all (I'd fall into this category), some think it means that winning must be achieved at all costs. In short, unless you're careful to ensure that everyone really is on the same page, trouble can ensue.

That said, good luck :)

This sounds really lovely. I find that nice people who don't rage at everyone is hard to come by nowadays. I haven't played league in over a year and only just got back into it and find that it's anxiety inducing to play because I left my account in a state where I am still being matched up with skilled players, but I've become quite clunky with my playing. I don't have a mic, but it would be nice to play with some friendly people for a change. :)
No worries, I am willing to help you get use to the new features
